scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,UI -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix coachqa-backend" "npm run dev --prefix coachqa-ui"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix coachqa-backend" "npm run build --prefix coachqa-ui"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix coachqa-backend" "npm run lint --prefix coachqa-ui"
